il.ac.hit.couponstoreu.controller

Class CouponUserServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • il.ac.hit.couponstoreu.controller.CouponUserServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    @WebServlet(value="/CouponUserServlet")
public class CouponUserServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    Servlet implementation class CouponUserServlet. This Servlet manage the session for the users viewing coupons and purchasing them.
    Author:
    nadav Eliyahu.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • gotoNavBarJSP

        public void gotoNavBarJSP(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                 java.lang.String tailStr)
                   throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                          java.io.IOException
        This method forward the user request to a specific page from the upper navigation bar.
        Parameters:
        request - the request is this CouponUserServlet request object that holds the reference to the user request.
        response - the response is this CouponUserServlet response object that holds the reference to server response.
        tailStr - the tailStr is a string object that represent the end of the URL.
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException - if there was a wrong user request
        java.io.IOException - if there was a bad response from the server.

      • RemoveCoupon

        public void RemoveCoupon(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                javax.servlet.http.HttpSession s,
                java.lang.String str)
                  throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                         java.io.IOException
        This method removes a coupon object from the CouponCart object that represent the cart. there are two options for remove : 1.remove all the cart 2.remove only a specific object from the cart according to id.
        Parameters:
        request - the request is this CouponUserServlet request object that holds the reference to the user request. @see HttpServletRequest
        response - the response is this CouponUserServlet response object that holds the reference to server response. @see HttpServletResponse
        str - the tailStr is a string object that represent the end of the URL.
        s - the s variable holds the reference to the HttpSession object.
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException - if there was a wrong user request @see ServletException
        java.io.IOException - if there was a bad response from the server. @see IOException
